mapper.sql: asn_no, print_count, ext_order_no, delivery_time, check_user_id, check_name, check_status, po_no, order_no, asn_type, asn_status, asn_source, order_price, to_shop_id, to_shop_name, from_shop_id, from_shop_name, expected_time, volume, memo, carrier_id, carrier_name, place_loading, place_discharge, pay_terms, delivery_terms, descr, vehicle_no, address, mobile, user_define1, user_define2, user_define3, zip_code, supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_address, supplier_zip_code, supplier_contact, supplier_tel, i_id, i_name, i_address, i_zip_code, i_contact, i_tel, receiving_time, created_name, created_time, updated_name, updated_time

where.if: and (a.order_no like concat(concat('%',#{q}),'%') or a.asn_no like concat(concat('%',#{q}),'%') or a.po_no like concat(concat('%',#{q}),'%') )

mapper.select: select o.asn_no as o_asn_no, o.print_count as o_print_count, o.ext_order_no as o_ext_order_no, o.delivery_time as o_delivery_time, o.check_name as o_check_name, o.check_status as o_check_status, o.po_no as o_po_no, o.order_no as o_order_no, o.asn_type as o_asn_type, o.asn_status as o_asn_status, o.asn_source as o_asn_source, o.order_price as o_order_price, o.to_shop_id as o_to_shop_id, o.to_shop_name as o_to_shop_name, o.from_shop_id as o_from_shop_id, o.from_shop_name as o_from_shop_name, o.expected_time as o_expected_time, o.volume as o_volume, o.memo as o_memo, o.address as o_address, o.mobile as o_mobile, o.supplier_id as o_supplier_id, o.supplier_name as o_supplier_name, o.supplier_address as o_supplier_address, o.supplier_contact as o_supplier_contact, o.supplier_tel as o_supplier_tel, o.i_id as o_i_id, o.i_name as o_i_name, o.i_address as o_i_address, o.i_contact as o_i_contact, o.i_tel as o_i_tel, o.receiving_time as o_receiving_time, o.carrier_id as o_carrier_id, o.carrier_name as o_carrier_name, d.asn_detail_id as d_asn_detail_id, d.asn_no as d_asn_no, d.line_no as d_line_no, d.category_code as d_category_code, d.category_name as d_category_name, d.bar_code as d_bar_code, d.brand_code as d_brand_code, d.brand_name as d_brand_name, d.goods_name as d_goods_name, d.sku as d_sku, d.parent_sku as d_parent_sku, d.property as d_property, d.po_no as d_po_no, d.po_line_no as d_po_line_no, d.line_status as d_line_status, d.receive_time as d_receive_time, d.receive_qty as d_receive_qty, d.order_qty as d_order_qty, d.expected_qty as d_expected_qty, d.damaged_qty as d_damaged_qty, d.expected_time as d_expected_time, d.rejected_qty as d_rejected_qty, d.rejected_time as d_rejected_time, d.unit as d_unit, d.convert_qty as d_convert_qty, d.convert_unit as d_convert_unit, d.total_price as d_total_price, d.cost_price as d_cost_price, d.lot_num as d_lot_num, d.price as d_price, d.goods_type as d_goods_type, d.volume as d_volume, d.rate_precent as d_rate_precent, d.memo as d_memo, d.created_time as d_created_time, d.updated_time as d_updated_time from doc_asn_header o left join doc_asn_details d on d.asn_no = o.asn_no where o.asn_no = #{asnNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select asn_no from doc_asn_header where asn_no like concat(#{asnNo},'%') order by asn_no desc
